name: MQL5 Source Code File
summary: An MQ5 file is a program written for MetaTrader, an online trading platform. It contains source code written in MetaQuotes Language 5 (MQL5), which includes classes, variables, functions, and comments that can be compiled into an .EX5 file. MQ5 files replaced .MQ4 files with the release of MetaTrader 5.
